title: Write Social Media Posts for a Week
description: A social media manager needs to write and schedule a week's worth of posts for a client's Instagram account.

tasks.description: Review the content calendar for the week's themes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the topics for each day.

tasks.description: Write engaging captions for five posts, including relevant hashtags and user tags.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces five on-brand and engaging pieces of copy.

tasks.description: Schedule each post for its designated day and time in the social media scheduling tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules all content for the week.
